name: AI Accuracy
description: State-of-the-art neural networks trained on millions of gestures for industry-leading recognition.

name: Low Latency
description: Sub-100ms processing speed ensures your conversations flow naturally without awkward pauses.

name: Cross-Platform
description: Available on Web, soon on Android and IOS. Start a conversation on one device and continue on another.

name: Privacy First
description: End-to-end encryption for all video streams. We never store your personal conversations.
